hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Attraction Storyboard

searchHint.text: Can't find what you're looking for?

items.question: What is Attraction Storyboard?
items.answer: Attraction Storyboard is a comprehensive travel guide and discovery platform that helps you explore attractions worldwide. We aggregate information from multiple sources including Google Places, community reviews, real-time weather data, and AI-powered recommendations to help you plan the perfect trip.

items.question: Is it free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Attraction Storyboard is completely free to use. All features, attraction information, reviews, and travel recommendations are accessible without any subscription or payment required.

items.question: How do you get your information?
items.answer: We collect information from multiple trusted sources including Google Places API, community reviews, real-time weather data from OpenWeatherMap, video recommendations from YouTube, and AI-powered insights using Google Generative AI. All information is aggregated, verified, and continuously updated.

items.question: Can I contribute reviews or tips?
items.answer: We welcome community contributions! If you'd like to contribute reviews, tips, or other content to help other travelers, please contact us. We review all submissions to ensure quality and accuracy.

items.question: Is my personal information secure?
items.answer: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information. Please review our Privacy Policy for detailed information about how we handle your data.

items.question: Can I bookmark or save attractions?
items.answer: Currently, bookmarking features are in development. However, you can use your browser's bookmark feature or take screenshots of attraction pages to save them for later reference.

items.question: How often is the information updated?
items.answer: We continuously update our information from real-time sources. Weather data and attraction ratings are refreshed regularly, while community reviews and tips are added as users contribute them. Information accuracy may vary by location and source.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: We'd love to help! You can reach our support team by emailing or using the contact form at /contact. We typically respond within 24 hours.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is here to help. Get in touch with us!
